|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Beautiful Crystal |image = XC3 Accessory Medal.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt by 50% per enemy defeated (to a maximum of 250%). |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 13,600 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Beautiful Crystal |image = XC3 Accessory Medal.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt by 55% per enemy defeated (to a maximum of 250%). |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 13,600 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Beautiful Crystal |image = XC3 Accessory Medal.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt by 60% per enemy defeated (to a maximum of 250%). |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 13,600 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Beautiful Crystals''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Begest Brog |image = |caption = Begest Brog |category = Normal Minor Enemy |type = [[Brog]] |level = 59-62
72-73 |area = [[Erythia Sea]] ([[Brasa Geothermal Belt]])
[[Low Maktha Wildwood]] |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Begest Brogs''' are Normal Minor Enemies in {{XC3}}. They are members of the [[Brog]] family, and can be found at level 72-73 at [[Low Maktha Wildwood]] in the [[Pentelas Region]], or at level 59-62 at the [[Brasa Geothermal Belt]] in [[Erythia Sea]]. {{clr}} == {{XC3FR|sub}} == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Begest Brog |image = |caption = Begest Brog |category = Normal Minor Enemy |type = [[Brog]] |level = 14 |area = [[Aurora Shelf]] ([[Zalmor's Falls]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = }} '''Begest Brogs''' are Normal Minor Enemies in {{XC3FR}}. They are members of the [[Brog]] family, and can be found at level 14 around [[Zalmor's Falls]] on the [[Aurora Shelf]] during [[Weather (XC3)|rain]]. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{Fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:Pentelas Region Enemies]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Brogs]] [[Category:XC3 Level 56-60 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 61-65 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 71-75 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Minor Enemies]] [[Category:Aurora Shelf Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Brogs]] [[Category:XC3FR Level 11-15 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Weather Dependent Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing drops]]

{{for|other uses|Bind}} {{Infobox XC3 Status |title = Bind |caption = Makes it impossible to move. |image = XC3 Bind.png |type = Debuff |attribute = Ether |base-duration = 7.5s |max-duration = 11.25s |success-rate = 60% |rng-applicable = Yes }} '''Bind''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. It prevents the affected character from moving.
== Distribution == === Arts === * [[Earth Bind]] ([[Strategos]]) * [[Spearpoint Thrust]] ([[Thaumaturge]]) * [[Thunder Steel]] ([[Lost Vanguard]]) * [[Hypnotism]] ([[Soulhacker]]; requires Soul Hacking [[Profound Hodzuki]]) * [[Shadow Stitch (XC3)|Shadow Stitch]] ([[Royal Summoner]]; only applied when hitting from back) * [[Moonshadow]] ([[Isurd]]) * [[Furious Flash]] ([[Teach]])
[[Category:XC3 Status]] [[Category:XC3FR Status]]
{{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}}
